title: Java TechDays in Moscow
body: I'm just finishing up two great (but tiring!) days in Moscow. We've had a crew of evangelists and engineers doing non-stop detailed technical presentations. There are a lot of great bright engineers here. The event was held in the headquarters of the Russian Academy of Sciences - a building with the world's coolest clock on top. I had to go for the ritual wander through Red Square and get a typical tourist photo. Lots of fun. It's a great place. The psycho thing is that we're doing another one of these in Johannesburg in two weeks...
